author: craigmcc
msg: Fix the pattern matching logic that identifies the requested action from
the path info value (if using prefix matching) or the servlet path value
(if using extension matching).

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a setLocale() method that stores the user's selected Locale under the
appropriate session attribute key, without the application having to know
(or care) what the key is.
Submitted by: David Geary <sabreware@tri-lakesonline.net>

author: craigmcc
msg: Modify the build script to deal with changes in the final released version
of Ant 1.1.  Basically, Ant's <javac> task no longer copies local resource
files (*.properties) to the destination directory by default -- you have
to do this yourself.  This caused the resources to be omitted from the
nightly distribution builds -- which (of course) use the most recent
version of Ant.
At any rate, this should fix problems encountered with Struts builds from
about 07/23/2000 on.  Please download the latest version (20000725) and
try again.
